Control Name: CA-3 (3) UNCLASSIFIED NON-NATIONAL SECURITY SYSTEM CONNECTIONS
Control Statement: The organization prohibits the direct connection of an [Assignment: organization-defined unclassified, non-national security system] to an external network without the use of [Assignment; organization-defined boundary protection device].
